video.title: Orange Is the New Black
video.synopsis: A privileged New Yorker ends up in a women's prison when a past crime catches up with her in this Emmy-winning series from the creator of "Weeds."

episodes.synopsis: Sentenced to fifteen months for a crime committed in her youth, Piper Chapman leaves her supportive fiance Larry for her new home: a women's prison.
episodes.title: I Wasn't Ready

episodes.synopsis: After insulting the food in front of the prison chef, Piper is starved out by the kitchen staff and struggles to offer up an acceptable apology.
episodes.title: Tit Punch

episodes.synopsis: Targeted for romance by a fellow prisoner, Piper finds that subtlety is an ineffective approach to letting her suitor down.
episodes.title: Lesbian Request Denied

episodes.synopsis: Piper gets to know her stern new roommate; the prisoners prepare a farewell party for one of their own; a misplaced screwdriver has dire consequences.
episodes.title: Imaginary Enemies

episodes.synopsis: When her sighting of a legendary feral chicken polarizes the inmates, Larry wonders if Piper is getting too absorbed in the "fishbowl" of prison life.
episodes.title: The Chickening

episodes.synopsis: The inmates campaign along racial lines for positions on a prisoners council, but Piper tries to stay above the increasingly raucous competition.
episodes.title: WAC Pack

episodes.synopsis: Piper wants the prison's outdoor running track reopened, but in order to get it, she'll have to give her corrections officer something he wants.
episodes.title: Blood Donut

episodes.synopsis: Red gets pressured to smuggle drugs through her kitchen; Larry publishes an article about Piper in the "New York Times;" two babies come into the world.
episodes.title: Moscow Mule

episodes.synopsis: Thanksgiving arrives with the promise of a visit by Larry, but Piper's raunchy dance moves land her in solitary with a holiday feast of moldy bologna.
episodes.title: F*cksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Pennsatucky discovers a new skill; the inmates try to scare delinquent teenagers straight; Pornstache's side business suffers a tragic setback.
episodes.title: Bora Bora Bora

episodes.synopsis: The prisoners mourn one of their own and even a drunken Pornstache reveals surprising emotions; Larry gives a revealing radio interview.
episodes.title: Tall Men with Feelings

episodes.synopsis: Painful truths reorient several relationships and careers; Pennsatucky feels disrespected by Piper, which is not good; Larry delivers an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Fool Me Once

episodes.synopsis: Red's scheme to reclaim her kitchen backfires; the inmates stage a Christmas pageant; Piper's plans unravel even as she realizes her life is in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Can't Fix Crazy

episodes.synopsis: Piper's world is turned upside down when she’s forced to confront the consequences of her actions and face new challenges.
episodes.title: Thirsty Bird

episodes.synopsis: A mock Job Fair provides Taystee with a chance to show off her business smarts; Red feels isolated from her prison family.
episodes.title: Looks Blue, Tastes Red

episodes.synopsis: Piper finds new arrival Soso a challenge; Morello gets her heart broken; a figure from Taystee’s past arrives to disturb the status quo.
episodes.title: Hugs Can Be Deceiving

episodes.synopsis: Sophia gives the women a much-needed lesson in the female anatomy; Morello takes a detour; Larry makes some life changes.
episodes.title: A Whole Other Hole

episodes.synopsis: A bathroom turf war sees deeper lines drawn in the sand as Gloria and Vee go head to head. Piper receives devastating news.
episodes.title: Low Self Esteem City

episodes.synopsis: Love is in the air as the inmates prepare for a Valentine's Day party; Red makes an intriguing new discovery. Larry asks Piper to be his prison mole.
episodes.title: You Also Have a Pizza

episodes.synopsis: Piper starts a prison newsletter with the help of Healy and a few other inmates; Vee launches an entrepreneurial enterprise.
episodes.title: Comic Sans

episodes.synopsis: Piper faces a new backlash over special privileges; Caputo feels pressure to toughen up, resulting in administrative changes.
episodes.title: Appropriately Sized Pots

episodes.synopsis: Piper's relationship with Larry faces a real-world test; Red's effort to redeem herself is finally rewarded. A familiar figure returns to Litchfield.
episodes.title: 40 Oz. of Furlough

episodes.synopsis: The guards get tougher in a bid to turn up prison contraband; a big, lingering secret is finally revealed.
episodes.title: Little Mustachioed Shit

episodes.synopsis: Piper is shocked at an unexpected change in her status; Soso’s hunger strike attracts new support that takes on a religious fervor.
episodes.title: Take a Break From Your Values

episodes.synopsis: Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.
episodes.title: It Was the Change

episodes.synopsis: Several futures hang in the balance as the inmates face and confront their worst nightmares: Life will never be the same again.
episodes.title: We Have Manners. We're Polite.

episodes.synopsis: Caputo's kinder, gentler new regime includes organizing a Mother's Day fair for the inmates that brings up a LOT of mixed feelings about family.
episodes.title: Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: Tempers flare when bed bugs invade, as Alex cracks, Red lashes out at Piper, Aleida interferes with Daya and Bennett, and Caputo gets bad news.
episodes.title: Bed Bugs and Beyond

episodes.synopsis: Nicky's stash situation gets complicated. Alex and Crazy Eyes try a new drama class. Red assists Healy with a personal matter.
episodes.title: Empathy Is a Boner Killer

episodes.synopsis: Big Boo comes up with a scheme to make money. Daya, Taystee and Crazy Eyes confront reality. Caputo tries to make a good impression on some visitors.
episodes.title: Finger in the Dyke

episodes.synopsis: Rumors fly among the inmates about a new, higher-paying job assignment, especially when they have to take a test for it.
episodes.title: Fake It Till You Fake It Some More

episodes.synopsis: Regime change isn't going over well with the staff, but Red makes it work for her. Lorna finds a way to meet men. Chang shows her private side.
episodes.title: Ching Chong Chang

episodes.synopsis: Norma’s healing powers draw more believers. Piper creates a new business venture. Caputo breaks in the new hires.
episodes.title: Tongue-Tied

episodes.synopsis: Piper gets creative in order to grow her business. Crazy Eyes’s sci-fi sex story for drama class is a hit. Alex doesn’t trust new inmate Lolly.
episodes.title: Fear, and Other Smells

episodes.synopsis: Too many inmates seem to be getting religion, so a rabbi comes to visit and Leanne tries to organize Norma's followers.
episodes.title: Where My Dreidel At

episodes.synopsis: Pennsatucky, Piper, Crazy Eyes and Lorna get closer with their new admirers. Tensions between Sophia and Gloria, and Alex and Lolly escalate.
episodes.title: A Tittin' and a Hairin'

episodes.synopsis: Caputo and Piper confront labor issues. A miracle occurs in Norma's group. Crazy Eyes's erotica winds up in the hands of the staff.
episodes.title: We Can Be Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Daya goes into labor. Sophia suffers a hate crime. Stella helps Piper with a business snag. Taystee takes on a new role.
episodes.title: Don’t Make Me Come Back There

episodes.synopsis: Miracles and conversions occur, but Piper and Caputo know that some situations can't be dealt with through spiritual means.
episodes.title: Trust No Bitch
